v_msg.vocalized.matthew.vocalized.bio: Hi! This is Matthew, the built-in male voice of the Vocalized mod, powered by Amazon Polly.
v_msg.vocalized.salli.vocalized.bio: Hi! Here's Salli, the built-in female voice of the Vocalized mod, powered by Amazon Polly.
v_msg.vocalized.zhi_yu.vocalized.bio: 您好，我叫知语，是 Vocalized 模组的内置中文语音，由 Amazon Polly 提供技术支持。
screen.vocalized.cfg.title: Vocalized Settings
vocalized.voice_type.vocalized.mute.desc: Muted, you won't send any voice message.
